channel.title: Netdata on Bevisy's Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in Netdata on Bevisy's Blogs

item.title: 通过nginx为netdata提供https访问
item.description: nginx 代理 netdata 并添加鉴权 netdata 安装 #!/bin/bash docker run -d --name=netdata \ -p 30002:19999 \ -v /etc/passwd:/host/etc/passwd:ro \ -v /etc/group:/host/etc/group:ro \ -v /proc:/host/proc:ro \ -v /sys:/host/sys:ro \ -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro \ -e DO_NOT_TRACK=1 \ --cap-add SYS_PTRACE \ --security-opt apparmor=unconfined \ netdata/netdata nginx 安装 #!/usr/bin/env bash docker run -d \ --name nginx \ -v $(pwd)/html:/usr/share/nginx/html \ -v $(pwd)/conf.
